programme.title: The Last Alaskans
programme.desc: The Last Alaskans is an American reality TV series following several families and trappers who are allowed to live in the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge in Alaska. Have a close look at their daily routine in the most remote area of the US. Far away from the civilization, they have to deal with harsh weather and arctic conditions, wildlife and long distances without any modern conveniences. Heimo, Bob, Ray, Tyler and their families offer you an honest view of their struggle and thrive in Alaskas untouched wilderness.

programme.title: Monsters Inside Me
programme.desc: Monsters Inside Me is a TV documentary series about rare infectious diseases. It presents interviews with people and their personal stories about contracting rare diseases, mostly caused by deadly parasites, as well as general infectious diseases, including those caused by viruses, bacteria, and fungi. Medical staff on the other hand is trying to unravel each case before its too late. The narrator is Justin Peed, and biologist Dan Riskin explains how and why each infectious agent works inside its host.

programme.title: My Cat from Hell
programme.desc: Jackson Galaxy is a cat behaviorist. He is the person who resolves conflicts or behavioral issues between the owners and their cats or even between the cats and other pets. These are attacks and misbehavior, and Jackson is a true cat-lover and a believer that any problem can be solved thanks to love, patience and proper handling. Taking good care of cats is a demanding process and a whole science, but in return you will get a loving and purring family member.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: US reality TV show follows the Irwin family through their adventures in continuing Steve Irwins legacy. The family share their wildlife experiences from their travels across the world. They show how they care for all the animals while giving insight into their family life at Australia Zoo where they live and work. The Australian family including mother Terri who is a naturalist and conservationist stars alongside daughter Bindi and son Robert who are fully immerse in animal life and their family.

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the Bronx Zoo, one of the largest zoos in the USA and the largest city zoo the country has to offer. Opening their doors to camera crews, the daily operations of the world-famous animal sanctuary are revealed, as the staff keep their loving creatures healthy and happy. Renowned for its diverse collection of animals and wonderful exhibitions, the Bronx Zoo is one of the finest in the world, home to lions, bears, tigers, snow leopards, baboons, flamingos and many more extravagant species. This series showcases the effort, experience and expertise required to run the Bronx Zoo.

programme.title: Jeremy Wades Dark Waters
programme.desc: Join biologist and angling expert Jeremy Wade as he travels the world peering through our darkest, murky waters, investigating tales of mythical monsters, mutated beasts and depleting fish populations. The star of River Monsters is back to explain the unexplainable, as he investigates these reported sightings of unknown creatures. Whether its Lake Gardas reptilian monster, a species of pike the size of a man, a river monster deemed extinct in the Outback or South Africas fabled half-man, half-fish monster, Jeremy will need to use all of his experience if he is to catch, or even glimpse, these creatures.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet is a TV series entirely dedicated to love and care for animals. Thanks to a genius Dr. Jeff Young Denvers Planned Pethood Plus veterinary clinic is always busy and is taking care of 80,000-plus clients and their pets. Dr. Jeffs sharp surgical skills and his unconditional love for animals make him one of the most respected vets in the country. Dr. Jeff has a dedicated team of more than 30 veterinary staffers and once a month they go to remote locations where people do not have access to vets.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Follow aquarium enthusiasts Brett Raymer and Wayde King as they attempt to build some of the most luxurious fish tanks in the world. At Acrylic Tank Manufacturing, the brothers-in-law guide you through the design process and the building of their truly jaw-dropping aquariums. Experience the unveiling of finished tanks housed everywhere from restaurants and banks, to glamorous casinos and mansions. Join the duo in their Las Vegas workshop as they deliver some budget-shattering builds to their high-profile clientele.

programme.title: Animal Cops: Miami
programme.desc: Animal Cops: Miami is a documentary reality series following dedicated animal control officers as they provide a valuable service to the animals of Miami-Dade County. Keeping a close eye on the regions creatures, both wild and domesticated, the control officers visit various locations to investigate reports of injured or sick animals, and deplorable cases of animal cruelty, ensuring they are provided with the welfare they deserve. The series also follows individuals from the Everglades Outpost nature rehabilitation centre, as they investigate reports of animals being improperly released into the wetland area.

programme.title: Vet Life: Bonus Tails
programme.desc: Documentary series that gives viewers some more information, and shows deleted scenes and bonus unseen footage from the show The Vet Life, that follows the lives and work of three veterinarians- Dr. Diarra Blue, Dr. Aubrey Ross and Dr. Michael Lavigne, who moved to Houston to open a full-service veterinarian hospital and animal shelter.

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: Follow the daily work of devoted agents from the Louisiana Department of Wildlife and Fisheries as they protect the natural resources of the state of Louisiana. Join them as they patrol across the country, stopping illegal activities and rescuing wounded animals.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Reality series, set in Texas and similar to North Woods Law, that follows daily lives of men and women who are Game Wardens and whose job is to protect deserts, lakes, woods, bayous, coasts and wild animals that live in the second-largest state in the U.S. These people have their plates full as they must deal with poachers, hunters who dont obey the law, smugglers, while they rescue injured wildlife and defend citizens.

programme.title: Treetop Cat Rescue
programme.desc: Climbing enthusiasts brother-in-law duo Shaun Sears and Tom Otto work together to rescue the felines that climb beyond capability and get stuck in Washington State. The experienced tree climbers do their best to rescue all of the cats they find out about whether a call comes in at day or night. With sometimes unfavourable weather, weak branches and bees nests to overcome the pair have to overcome obstacles and then have to avoid scaring the cats away as they approach.

programme.title: Treetop Cat Rescue

programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees
programme.desc: American reality series following the team at the Villalobos Rescue centre on their quest to rescue and rehome dogs. Founded by Tia Maria Torres, the centre challenges the misconceptions surrounding bully breeds, such as pit bulls, with hopes of eventually rehoming them. Alongside Tia are her team of dog-loving parolees, each tasked with training, rescuing and caring for the animals. Each episode covers the emotional stories of both her employees and their rescue dogs. Will their jobs help them as they transition away from jail or will they struggle alongside the pups to rebuild their reputation?

programme.desc: American animal TV series with designer Antonio Ballatore own show creating the perfect space for pet owning families. Pets include Chinchillas, dogs, cats and snakes and possibly many more.

programme.title: Shark Week Immersion
programme.desc: The Immersion crew answers a wide range of shark-fuelled questions by taking some of the most iconic shark moments from pop culture history and bringing them to real life.

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: Alaskan Bush People is an American docudrama-style reality TV series revolving around the Brown family, members of which are trying to survive in the wilderness, far away from the society. Take a journey deep into Alaskas bush, where naturalist and adventurer Billy Brown, along with his wife, Ami, and their seven children, choose to live life on their own terms, connected to wild nature and bonded to each other.

programme.title: Louisiana Law

programme.title: In Search of Monsters
programme.desc: Documentary series. Using eye-witness accounts and new, incredible scientific evidence, In Search Of Monsters brings to life the haunting creatures that both fright and fascinate us. Narrated by Gabe Kunda, the series covers some of the most iconic and infamous monsters in folklore. From Bigfoots DNA to Nessies true whereabouts, In Search Of Monsters investigates astonishing new theories on these grisly giants.

programme.title: With a fishing rod to the end of the world
programme.desc: Four avid anglers embark on the adventure of a lifetime, as they travel across the seven continents to fish where no one has fished before. These four, very different characters are made up of Chris Owens, Thad Robison, Brian Jill and Jay Johnson, and all of them have decided to leave their homes and hit the road. With much of the land inaccessible by any other means, theyre driving across the world to reach wild locations, where they will cast out and try to catch some of the rarest fish on the planet. A remarkable documentary series following the determined group of best friends, as they traverse dangerous roads, deadly terrain and precarious waters to achieve their dreams.

programme.desc: Following the animal cruelty investigators of the House Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (HSPCA), this team work in a large area of Texas to investigate reports of animal cruelty and saving some from abusive situations. Working closely with local law enforcement due to not having arrest or warrant seeking powers on their own, the office permanently assigned Deputy Constable Christine Kendrick to assist the investigators in law enforcement issues that occur and charge people who bring abuse to innocent animals. Premiering in 2003 on Animal Planet, this American documentary TV series is the third in a collection of shows known as "Animal Planet Heroes". Each episode typically follows two to three stories of rescues including animals in abusive situations, neglectful conditions or animals injured or stuck in dangerous places.

programme.title: The Travel Show
programme.desc: Join the Travel Show team as they take you on a criss-cross journey across the globe, visiting the most popular holiday destinations as well as sampling some hidden gems. The itinerary includes up-and-coming hot spots for holidaymakers and uncovering some lesser-known facts about places on many peoples bucket lists. This BBC programme takes you to every corner of the planet, providing an all-round insight into the world of travel. From winter wonderland activities such as eco skiing in Denmark and trekking across glaciers in Iceland, to warmer destinations as diverse as Rwanda and the Great Barrier Reef in Australia, your adventure starts here.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: In-depth news and current affairs review of the main political and economic stories of the day, featuring robust interviews with senior government and opposition figures, business and union leaders, and analytical reports that delve behind the headlines. Regular presenters cross-examine studio guests on details of policies, priorities, actions and inactions, on a range of domestic UK and international topics. There are weekly features on the arts, sports and the world of technology, and editors are not afraid to venture into niche, specialist and exotic areas from space travel to animal psychology. If the BBCs flagship Radio 4 Today programme sets the early morning news agenda for the day, then its late-night TV equivalent often gives the people in power some sleepless nights.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Newscast
programme.desc: Join BBC journalists including political editor Laura Kuenssberg, Europe editor Katya Adler, Brussels correspondent Adam Fleming and political correspondent Chris Mason in their weekly podcast discussing all of the news stories that matter to the people of the United Kingdom. The journalists know all about the stories that theyre talking about - they interview the most important people involved in the stories that feature in the news. They speak of their knowledge and understanding of the news in a way that is understandable for all. Laura is often in a car in the middle of a city where big politics stories are happening. Katya, Adam and Chris are usually in the studio. They regularly talk about Brexit and what is going to happen when the United Kingdom leaves the European Union.

The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Focus on Africa
programme.desc: Focus on Africa is a BBC news program broadcast globally and on local partner channels of the BBC in African countries. The program used to be presented by Komla Dumor each weekday from its inception until his death in 2014; now it is hosted by Sophie Ikenye, a news presenter from Kenya. The program includes news, sport and business from across Africa and the rest of the globe. Get the top African stories and keep up with the latest international events.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: Newscast
programme.desc: Join BBC journalists including political editor Laura Kuenssberg, Europe editor Katya Adler, Brussels correspondent Adam Fleming and political correspondent Chris Mason in their weekly podcast discussing all of the news stories that matter to the people of the United Kingdom. The journalists know all about the stories that theyre talking about - they interview the most important people involved in the stories that feature in the news. They speak of their knowledge and understanding of the news in a way that is understandable for all. Laura is often in a car in the middle of a city where big politics stories are happening. Katya, Adam and Chris are usually in the studio. They regularly talk about Brexit and what is going to happen when the United Kingdom leaves the European Union.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: In-depth news and current affairs review of the main political and economic stories of the day, featuring robust interviews with senior government and opposition figures, business and union leaders, and analytical reports that delve behind the headlines. Regular presenters cross-examine studio guests on details of policies, priorities, actions and inactions, on a range of domestic UK and international topics. There are weekly features on the arts, sports and the world of technology, and editors are not afraid to venture into niche, specialist and exotic areas from space travel to animal psychology. If the BBCs flagship Radio 4 Today programme sets the early morning news agenda for the day, then its late-night TV equivalent often gives the people in power some sleepless nights.

It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Newscast
programme.desc: Join BBC journalists including political editor Laura Kuenssberg, Europe editor Katya Adler, Brussels correspondent Adam Fleming and political correspondent Chris Mason in their weekly podcast discussing all of the news stories that matter to the people of the United Kingdom. The journalists know all about the stories that theyre talking about - they interview the most important people involved in the stories that feature in the news. They speak of their knowledge and understanding of the news in a way that is understandable for all. Laura is often in a car in the middle of a city where big politics stories are happening. Katya, Adam and Chris are usually in the studio. They regularly talk about Brexit and what is going to happen when the United Kingdom leaves the European Union.

programme.title: Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Таран, во время драки, убивает одного из двух неизвестных, которых застал в своей квартире. Второму удается уйти. Несмотря на попытку обставить убийство как самооборону, Тарана арестовывают. От сокамерника он узнает информацию о расстреле влиятельных бизнесменов в городе.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Слепой Арсен теряет сына. Парня убивают в машине. Теперь милиция ожидает новую волну убийств, но уже со стороны Арсена, который захочет отомстить за своего сына. Тарану удается узнать, что какой-то "оборотень" из отдела сливает информацию криминалу.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Таран находится в тюрьме за двойное убийство и ждет суда присяжных. А в это время, в стране появляется группа сопротивления, которая намерена бороться с коррумпированными должностными лицами. После ряда угроз, в собственной квартире убивают начальника таможни. СБУ решают использовать Тарана: подсадить его к подозреваемому в камеру и получить информацию.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Группой сопротивления убит ещё один чиновник. Кроме того, они пытаются поднять шум в СМИ и высылают журналистам материалы для публикации. В тюрьме Таран спасает от расправы парня-экстремиста, чтобы попасть в его группу.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Сотрудники полиции участвуют во всех особо важных делах – спасении заложников и переговорах с террористами, эвакуации жителей и обезвреживании бомб, охоте на серийного убийцу и даже решении семейных конфликтов. В арсенале у участников ГСР (группы стратегического реагирования) не только высокотехнологичное оружие, но еще и быстрый ум, интуиция и… багаж собственных проблем и травм, которые часто влияют на их работу.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Трое мужчин, которые недавно потеряли свои дома, берут в заложники ответственного за ипотечное кредитование. Один из них облил себя бензином и угрожет сжечь себя в прямом эфире, если его требования не будут выполнены. Ситуация разрешилась мирным путём. Донна Сабина (Джесика Стин) заменяет Джулс на время её отпуска из-за ранения.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Таран, во время драки, убивает одного из двух неизвестных, которых застал в своей квартире. Второму удается уйти. Несмотря на попытку обставить убийство как самооборону, Тарана арестовывают. От сокамерника он узнает информацию о расстреле влиятельных бизнесменов в городе.

At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. / Alan is so good-natured that Gumball feels compelled to make him lose his temper. / Things arent going Gumballs way at school so he assumes there must be a Secret Society... / Gumball and Darwin want to see the scariest film of the year. / Gumball and Darwin hit snooze too many times on their alarm clock and miss the school-bus. / Things keep going missing in the house so its up to Gumball and Darwin to find the culprit. / Gumball refuses to get out of bed because he is in a lousy mood. / Nicole arranges a playdate for Anais with the son of a classy lady she met at the supermarket.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Skinny brings home the wrong laundry bag. Not a disaster, as it happens, since this particular laundry bag contains uncanny super-suits that grant mighty powers. The Docs get heat vision, amazing telekinesis rays, magnetic boots, you name it. All perfect for the person who dreams of… doing the household chores. With great power comes great boringness, apparently. After a satisfying day of getting the house spick n span, the penny finally drops for the Super-docs: they realise they have a far higher calling. Is it fighting evil and helping the underdog? Nope, its chasing Lamput, same as usual. Meanwhile, however, two actual superheroes really want their suits back. Turns out these heroes are quite into helping the underdog. Which is good news for Lamput, and very, very bad news for the Docs.

programme.desc: Gumball must find a way to save his relationship with Darwin after the boys are forced to live in separate rooms.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Each member of the family thinks their demographic has it the toughest. Gumball and Darwin think guys have it the worst. Mom thinks women do. Anais thinks kids do. And Dad thinks that grown-ups do. They decide the only way to figure it out is to spend a day in each others shoes, no matter if theyre too-small, too-big, or high-heeled.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: The Tower is in lockdown and supplies are being gathered, as the Titans prepare for Doomsday. / The Titans negative behavior is giving superheroes a bad name, so they must learn proper conduct to be good role models for kids. / Robin finally experiences drip, a magical coolness that comes from wearing sneakers, and soon seeks out the ultimate pair. / While housesitting at Wayne Manor, the Titans must unravel the mystery of the clogged toilet.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Total DramaRama is canadian animated comedy series, spin-off of Total Drama, all characters are already well-known and loved by the audience. This time Duncan, Gwen, Courtney, Izzy, Noah, Bridgette and the rest find themselves in the past as kids and their adventures take place in kindergarten. The strict Chef Hatchet is there to keep his eye on them. programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Bunnicula
programme.desc: Once upon a time an extraordinary bunny is born in an average family of bunnies. The little guy looks just like a vampire- he has sharp fangs, his ears remind of bat wings and plus he is scared of sunlight. Bunnicula is never out in daylight, sleeps in a coffin, flies with bat wings, and drains juice from vegetables with his fangs which gives him enormous power. His family is afraid that he will attack somebody so they lock him in an old mansion. Bunnicula has been sleeping for many years until a little girl Mina unlocks hims and makes him a new member of her family. Her dog named Harold makes friends with Bunnicula straight away but the cat Chester is a little bit scared of him and does not seem to be happy about a new pet.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons complain about their day and order a pizza from Larry... / The citizens of Elmore are feeling down because its January, so Gumball and Anais invent a new holiday called Sluzzle Tag. / In Biology class, Gumball and Darwin are waiting for a butterfly to emerge from its chrysalis. / After Gumball and Darwin have too much sugary cereal they begin thinking about the mysteries of the universe. / Gumball, Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joes mom paints pictures which predict the future. / When Mr Small shows a health and safety video in class, Darwin becomes obsessed with the idea of keeping the Wattersons safe. / Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. / Alan is so good-natured that Gumball feels compelled to make him lose his temper. / Things arent going Gumballs way at school so he assumes there must be a Secret Society...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson, a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin, he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city, during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters, The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny, amazing, sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense, Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Welcome back to Elmore, where the laws of reality are a joke, and family life is anything but ordinary.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When the Wattersons internet cuts out, they have to adapt to a world without it. / Gumball decides to make some changes when an online personality test tells him that hes "The Loser". / Rocky is trying to find love with the help of the latest dating app… / Gumball and Darwin give Bobert specific instructions to ensure he acts safely. When Bobert starts applying his robot logic to their rules they realise they must be much clearer.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin starts working at an ice cream shop to get revenge on Jokers Gelato for denying him a free birthday scoop. / The Tower is in lockdown and supplies are being gathered, as the Titans prepare for Doomsday. / The Titans negative behavior is giving superheroes a bad name, so they must learn proper conduct to be good role models for kids. / Robin finally experiences drip, a magical coolness that comes from wearing sneakers, and soon seeks out the ultimate pair.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin accidentally create a loveable monster that eats their family. / Anais arrives in the bedroom to find a messy crime-scene and her Daisy doll missing. She realises Gumball and Darwin are the chief suspects. / A mysterious figure from Nicoles past shows up and challenges her to a fight, but the kids are surprised when she refuses. / A compilation of some of the funniest, most bizarre clips uploaded onto the internet by the people of Elmore. / When Rob purchases a universal remote from the Awesome Store he discovers he can control the universe. He rewinds into the past and remembers Gumball had left him in The Void. / When we last saw Gumball he was hitting rewind on Robs Universal Remote just in time to save himself from being trapped in The Void. / Gumball and Darwin go to extreme lengths to help Molly make her dull stories more interesting. / Anais has made a new friend, so Gumball and Darwin immediately assume there must be something wrong with him. / Gumball and Darwin think its one of those days when nothing interesting is happening. But as they walk around Elmore it appears exciting things are happening just not to them. 1

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Grandpa Louie gives them a cheque, the Watterson kids argue over how to spend the money. / When they find Anais training herself for a brutal showdown Gumball and Darwin realise that their sister is being pestered at school by an annoying kid: Billy. / An impromptu hug with a stranger at school leaves Gumball in an increasingly awkward social situation. / Mom and the kids depart for their hard days work leaving a seemingly lazy Dad half-asleep on the sofa. programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Total DramaRama is canadian animated comedy series, spin-off of Total Drama, all characters are already well-known and loved by the audience. This time Duncan, Gwen, Courtney, Izzy, Noah, Bridgette and the rest find themselves in the past as kids and their adventures take place in kindergarten. The strict Chef Hatchet is there to keep his eye on them. Any harmless idea of the kids turns out to be a total disaster, they are irrepressible in producing new ideas on how to have fun. the kids are discussing every single decision and plan in front of the cameras just like their adult versions, being a part of a reality show.

programme.title: Bunnicula
programme.desc: Once upon a time an extraordinary bunny is born in an average family of bunnies. The little guy looks just like a vampire- he has sharp fangs, his ears remind of bat wings and plus he is scared of sunlight. Bunnicula is never out in daylight, sleeps in a coffin, flies with bat wings, and drains juice from vegetables with his fangs which gives him enormous power. His family is afraid that he will attack somebody so they lock him in an old mansion. Bunnicula has been sleeping for many years until a little girl Mina unlocks hims and makes him a new member of her family. Her dog named Harold makes friends with Bunnicula straight away but the cat Chester is a little bit scared of him and does not seem to be happy about a new pet.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: The Tower is in lockdown and supplies are being gathered, as the Titans prepare for Doomsday. / Robin starts working at an ice cream shop to get revenge on Jokers Gelato for denying him a free birthday scoop. / In order to defeat The Calculator, the Titans must learn common core math. / Robin teaches the Titans all about health insurance. / The Titans negative behavior is giving superheroes a bad name, so they must learn proper conduct to be good role models for kids.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Colossus: Gumball and Darwin learn that it isnt wise to upset Hector Elmores resident Giant. / The Knights: Gumball and Tobias compete for Pennys affection by putting on the lamest duel in history. / The Remote: The Wattersons battle for possession of the TV remote gets dirty. / The Fridge: When Mom discovers Gumball has no ambition she is determined to turn him into a winner. / Gumball seeks justice when Banana Joe chews Darwins pen. / Gumball is determined to drive Penny away from Leslie / Darwin develops a texting addiction when he and Gumball get their first cell phone. / Richard gets a job as a pizza delivery man which worries Nicole when at the same time strange things begin to occur around the neighbourhood. / Gumball Darwin and Anais search for the Watterson family treasure.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball wants to get Richard on the cheerleading team in order to end their familys generational trauma.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin seek healthy food for their family, but an evil food consortium controls the industry.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin accidentally create a loveable monster that eats their family. / Anais arrives in the bedroom to find a messy crime-scene and her Daisy doll missing. She realises Gumball and Darwin are the chief suspects. / A mysterious figure from Nicoles past shows up and challenges her to a fight, but the kids are surprised when she refuses. / A compilation of some of the funniest, most bizarre clips uploaded onto the internet by the people of Elmore. / When Rob purchases a universal remote from the Awesome Store he discovers he can control the universe. He rewinds into the past and remembers Gumball had left him in The Void. / When we last saw Gumball he was hitting rewind on Robs Universal Remote just in time to save himself from being trapped in The Void. / Gumball and Darwin go to extreme lengths to help Molly make her dull stories more interesting. / Anais has made a new friend, so Gumball and Darwin immediately assume there must be something wrong with him. / Gumball and Darwin think its one of those days when nothing interesting is happening. But as they walk around Elmore it appears exciting things are happening just not to them. 1

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Mr Robinson accidentally lets slip how little he cares for Gumball and Darwin, they react by giving him the cold shoulder. Surprisingly Mr Robinson misses them and tries to win back their friendship. After a few failed attempts, Gumball and Darwin realise that Mr Robinsons heart is protecting him, so they give it an intense affection overload.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin help Anais rescue her doll from Tina Rex. / Gumball and Darwin are unwitting accomplices in a gas station robbery. / Gumball and Darwin accidentally destroy Mr Robinsons new car… or do they? / Gumball experiences an impossibly unfortunate chain of events. / Gumball and Darwin accidentally create a loveable monster that eats their family. / Gumball is embarrassed when Mum comes to school to spend some "quality time". / Gumballs magic tinfoil helmet threatens to tear the Watterson family apart! / Anais is convinced that Gumball is being bullied by Tina Rex.

programme.title: World Sport
programme.desc: One of the CNNs longest running programmes that allows viewers to find out all the global sports news, see all the important events and most interesting parts, and enjoy the interviews with sports pundits and various sports stars.

programme.title: The Brief with Jim Sciutto
programme.desc: The best of CNNs reporting from correspondents across the world, to guide global audiences through the fast-paced news cycle with insight, analysis and hard-hitting interviews.

programme.title: Erin Burnett OutFront
programme.desc: Hosted by Erin Burnett, an expert in political science and economics, OutFront is an hour-long news programme examining the latest stories from the US and further afield. Broadcast live from either the New York studio or live on location from the site of a breaking story, the show features insightful opinions from informed guests. With expert analysis from CNNs correspondents and analysis from the shows panel, Erin Burnett OutFront dissects the stories of the day, leaving no stone unturned. Burnett, a former financial analyst for Goldman Sachs, uses her forthright approach to engage interviewees in honest discussion.

programme.title: The Lead with Jake Tapper
programme.desc: News, politics and current affairs programme hosted by the award-winning, American journalist and author, Jake Tapper. Jake Tapper is the chief Washington correspondent for CNN and he will share his knowledge and insight into politics as well as covering a variety of other topics. This programme discusses a range of stories from topical events including national news, economics/finance, sports, health, technology and world affairs. The Lead with Jake Tapper has won a number of awards and accolades including three National Headliner Awards. Outside his work on television, Tapper has written for The New Yorker, The Washington Post and the Los Angeles Times as well as publishing his first novel, a political thriller.

programme.title: Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: Anderson Cooper delves into the days news, looking beyond the broadcast to give his take, prompting us to re-think what we hear in the headlines. Cooper has covered major, international stories like the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina on the Gulf Coast, the catastrophic BP oil spill and the 2010 earthquake in Haiti, which saw the whole world fall silent. The show has won an absolute plethora of awards over the years, including GLAAD Media and Emmy awards.

programme.title: The Source with Kaitlan Collins
programme.desc: Kaitlan Collins goes straight to the source for the best reporting on the days biggest stories.

programme.title: CNN NewsNight
programme.desc: Abby Phillip leads a roundtable discussion on the days biggest stories and issues shaping our world.

programme.title: Laura Coates Live
programme.desc: Laura Coates goes inside the story with a relentless pursuit of the facts.

programme.title: World Sport
programme.desc: One of the CNNs longest running programmes that allows viewers to find out all the global sports news, see all the important events and most interesting parts, and enjoy the interviews with sports pundits and various sports stars.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom
programme.desc: CNN Newroom provides the most up to date news as it breaks and is the longest running show on the channel, airing twice a day Monday to Friday and throughout the day over the weekends. CNN has developed a lot since its founding in 1980 by American media proprietor Ted Turner as a 24 hour cable news channel. As an organisation, CNN have won multiple awards, including a network-record six news and documentary Emmy Awards in 2018.

programme.title: World Sport
programme.desc: One of the CNNs longest running programmes that allows viewers to find out all the global sports news, see all the important events and most interesting parts, and enjoy the interviews with sports pundits and various sports stars.

programme.title: Marketplace Middle East
programme.desc: The Middle East is undergoing a healthcare revolution, with cutting-edge medical technology, increased investment, and world-class facilities transforming the sector. At the forefront of this change is Sir Magdi Yacoub, the renowned British-Egyptian heart surgeon whose groundbreaking work has saved countless lives. Now, hes bringing his expertise home with the launch of a state-of-the-art hospital in Cairo, set to become a regional center of excellence in cardiac care and research. We explore Yacoubs legacy his vision for the future of healthcare in the region. Also: in this Abu Dhabi operation theatre room, the lead surgeon, Dr. Usman Ahmad, has multiple robot arms as he conducts surgery. As the first hospital in the Gulf to successfully perform robotic lung transplants, Cleveland Clinic Abu Dhabi is at the forefront of the region, presenting a strong case for utilizing robotics in the treatment of complex thoracic conditions. We explore the importance of robotic-assisted surgery for high-risk patients and how this will transform transplant care in the wider region.

programme.title: Amanpour
programme.desc: Global affairs programme in which host Christiane Amanpour analyses some of the most relevant stories from around the world, often adding her personal experiences. She also interviews a variety of notable, high-profile people and key players from various fields.

programme.title: Early Start with Rahel Solomon
programme.desc: The news you need, first thing. Rahel Solomon has you covered with the latest headlines.

programme.title: CNN This Morning
programme.desc: The latest news and information from around the world. Don Lemon, Poppy Harlow, and Kaitlan Collins host.

programme.title: CNN News Central
programme.desc: Stay up to date with John Berman, Kate Bolduan and Sara Sidner from CNNs immersive news hub.

programme.title: CNN News Central
programme.desc: Stay up to date with John Berman, Kate Bolduan and Sara Sidner from CNNs immersive news hub.

programme.title: World Sport
programme.desc: One of the CNNs longest running programmes that allows viewers to find out all the global sports news, see all the important events and most interesting parts, and enjoy the interviews with sports pundits and various sports stars.

programme.title: World Sport
programme.desc: One of the CNNs longest running programmes that allows viewers to find out all the global sports news, see all the important events and most interesting parts, and enjoy the interviews with sports pundits and various sports stars.

programme.title: Marketplace Middle East
programme.desc: The Middle East is undergoing a healthcare revolution, with cutting-edge medical technology, increased investment, and world-class facilities transforming the sector. At the forefront of this change is Sir Magdi Yacoub, the renowned British-Egyptian heart surgeon whose groundbreaking work has saved countless lives. Now, hes bringing his expertise home with the launch of a state-of-the-art hospital in Cairo, set to become a regional center of excellence in cardiac care and research. We explore Yacoubs legacy his vision for the future of healthcare in the region. Also: in this Abu Dhabi operation theatre room, the lead surgeon, Dr. Usman Ahmad, has multiple robot arms as he conducts surgery. As the first hospital in the Gulf to successfully perform robotic lung transplants, Cleveland Clinic Abu Dhabi is at the forefront of the region, presenting a strong case for utilizing robotics in the treatment of complex thoracic conditions. We explore the importance of robotic-assisted surgery for high-risk patients and how this will transform transplant care in the wider region.

programme.title: One World
programme.desc: Zain Asher and Bianna Golodryga cover the top global and national issues of the day.

programme.title: One World
programme.desc: Zain Asher and Bianna Golodryga cover the top global and national issues of the day.

programme.title: Amanpour
programme.desc: Global affairs programme in which host Christiane Amanpour analyses some of the most relevant stories from around the world, often adding her personal experiences. She also interviews a variety of notable, high-profile people and key players from various fields.

programme.title: Isa Soares Tonight
programme.desc: Isa Soares deep dives into todays top stories with insightful conversations and reports from around the world.

programme.title: What We Know with Max Foster
programme.desc: Max Foster has a definitive roundup of the days top stories, giving you the urgent need-to-know context, plus a deeper dive into the questions sparking debate around the world.

programme.title: Quest Means Business
programme.desc: Hes not messing around: Richard Quest presents his hot takes on the biggest breaking stories in the world of business. Watch for the expert analysis, commentary and opinions on the important headlines in the field from the notorious English journalist and CNN anchor. Joined by a cast of experts and correspondents delivering unrivaled facts and news, but also features and fascinating takes, figures and analysis on everything going down in the world of business.

programme.title: The Lead with Jake Tapper
programme.desc: News, politics and current affairs programme hosted by the award-winning, American journalist and author, Jake Tapper. Jake Tapper is the chief Washington correspondent for CNN and he will share his knowledge and insight into politics as well as covering a variety of other topics. This programme discusses a range of stories from topical events including national news, economics/finance, sports, health, technology and world affairs. The Lead with Jake Tapper has won a number of awards and accolades including three National Headliner Awards. Outside his work on television, Tapper has written for The New Yorker, The Washington Post and the Los Angeles Times as well as publishing his first novel, a political thriller.

programme.title: World Sport
programme.desc: One of the CNNs longest running programmes that allows viewers to find out all the global sports news, see all the important events and most interesting parts, and enjoy the interviews with sports pundits and various sports stars.

programme.title: The Brief with Jim Sciutto
programme.desc: The best of CNNs reporting from correspondents across the world, to guide global audiences through the fast-paced news cycle with insight, analysis and hard-hitting interviews.

programme.title: Erin Burnett OutFront
programme.desc: Hosted by Erin Burnett, an expert in political science and economics, OutFront is an hour-long news programme examining the latest stories from the US and further afield. Broadcast live from either the New York studio or live on location from the site of a breaking story, the show features insightful opinions from informed guests. With expert analysis from CNNs correspondents and analysis from the shows panel, Erin Burnett OutFront dissects the stories of the day, leaving no stone unturned. Burnett, a former financial analyst for Goldman Sachs, uses her forthright approach to engage interviewees in honest discussion.

programme.title: High Speed Chase
programme.desc: In Camden, Georgia, a driver leads deputies on a 150-mph chase before a high-speed PIT brings the pursuit to a shocking, fiery end.

programme.title: 100 Days Wild
programme.desc: The brute harshness of Alaskas wilderness is no joke, with hostile weather and dangerous animals constantly lurking on the horizon. In this documentary series, a group of seven strangers give up their creature comforts to build a self-sustaining community along the Tanana River, and they have 100 days before the biting chill of winter arrives. They must quickly learn to work as a team if their makeshift community is going to work, learning to hunt, gather and implement basic structures that will keep them dry and warm. Will they be able to handle the wilderness?

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. And then he and his team do the restoration turning trash to gold, so that worn objects become shining gems for which Drews customers want to pay a lot of money. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: Misfit Garage
programme.desc: Misfit Garage is a reality TV show, a spin off from Fast N Loud. It features two of the mechanics fired from that shows Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage, Tom Smith and Jordan Butler, as well as Thomas Weeks and Scot McMillan, who together start a new company, Fired Up Garage. The crew run into former co-workers of the shop they were all fired from by Richard Rawlings and who they later find out is their new shop landlord. It takes a lot of courage to face the problems from the past and deal with the challenging present, but this is exactly what the guys do.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Freddy Dodges Mine Rescue
programme.desc: Mining veteran Freddy Dodge teams up with expert mechanic Juan Ibarra to help struggling mine owners with their failing operations. The pair come to the rescue sharing useful advice, practical knowledge and exclusive gold recovery techniques to transform the operations that could change the lives the mine owners forever.

programme.title: Gold Divers
programme.desc: Join the group of miners on their quest to find gold in the waters of Nome in Alaska. This reality show follows crews on boats equipped with different gadgets for gold mining- typically consisting of a sluicing apparatus, a means of paydirt collection (dredge) and a cold-water-diving life support system. With many aggravating circumstances such as rough seas, poor underwater visibility, personnel issues, ocean-damaging equipment failures and more, these tough and high tempered people risk their lives every day in hopes of finding gold and getting the big payout.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered how things that surround us every day are produced? Find out about the whole process from the beginning to the end in a documentary television series How Its Made. The series demonstrates how various items like clothing and accessories, food, industrial products, cars, musical instruments and many more are manufactured. Who would have thought how exciting it would be to watch a cupcake, formula 1 race car or gummy vitamins being made?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: As the modern world becomes progressively automated and mechanised its easy to become detached from how things are made and how they work. The hit series returns to uncover the miraculous feats of engineering which underpin life in the 21st century. How the seemingly mundane are often the result of highly sophisticated engineering and production processes. This fascinating behind-the-scenes journey delves deep into the production of everyday modern items from surfboards to satchels and trombones to cricket bats.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. With demanding customers, high turnover, and one of the biggest decorative salvage yards in the UK, Drew is constantly on the road, crisscrossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: Scrappers
programme.desc: Meet the colourful characters that work in Polands scrap metal industry. Plus, a behind the scenes view of where the materials come from and where they go after the scrapyard.

programme.title: Van Go
programme.desc: Brett builds the dream camping vehicle for an outdoorsy family of four. He tackles the challenge by adding a kitchen, bathroom and bunk beds for the kids.

programme.title: Van Go
programme.desc: Brett helps a Nashville musician get a van ready for tour by giving it a recording studio and a place to sleep - and of course, full of cowboy flair.

programme.title: Survival instinct
programme.desc: Each week, a new pair of total strangers are faced with the ultimate survival challenge: survive for 21 days together with no clothes or supplies in some of the most dangerous environments in the world. In addition to the landscape itself working against the duo, the local wildlife stalk them as well. Of course, the biggest complication for any of the couples might end up being their own clashing egos. Will they make it out alive, or will they fall victim to the wilderness? They must fall back on their most primal instincts to ensure they dont become prey themselves.

programme.title: Ant Anstead: Born Mechanic
programme.desc: Ant uncovers an extremely rare 1980 Alfasud thats been locked away for 35 years. But he learns reawakening the engine proves problematic.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: As the modern world becomes progressively automated and mechanised its easy to become detached from how things are made and how they work. programme.title: Fast n Loud
programme.desc: Fast N Loud is a reality styled TV show featuring Richard Rawlings and his crew from the Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage. For most people old rusty cars in garages or open spaces are nothing but junk, but not for these guys. For them it is a perfect chance to reconstruct such vehicles and make some money. The old run-down cars are restored flawlessly and are able to run steadily for the next 10 years for sure. Richard and his crew work really hard to make a name for themselves and have become a huge success thanks to their enormous talents.

programme.title: Mike Brewer: Born Dealer
programme.desc: Mike heads to Poland to avoid the dreaded British Porsche Tax. Plus, he turns a profit on an ugly duckling Peugeot and chases a sale at Santa Pod.

programme.title: Twin Turbos
programme.desc: Reality show that follows father and son duo Doug and Brad DeBerti who create one-of-a-kind custom cars and trucks for DeBerti Designs, their own firm, based in Arroyo Grande. Viewers will have a chance to see some high-profile projects such as a truck modeled after a fighter jet, the first ever drift-racing truck, a classic van transformed into a hot rod racing machine and many more cool projects. Besides building and customizing vehicles, Brad has another dream - to become a NASCAR driver, which he will try to do with the help from his mentor, NASCAR driver Joey Logano.

programme.title: Van Go
programme.desc: Brett builds a peaceful retreat on wheels to honour a clients late mum. One of his most elaborate builds, it includes a bedroom, bath and kitchen.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: Did you know that Australia accounts for over 95% of the worlds supply of opal? Well, these miners do, and in this documentary series we follow groups of brave and persevering souls as they scour the land in search of the precious and highly valuable gemstone. With many of the mines located in the desolately deserted Outback, the crews must face some of Australias most treacherous landscapes if they are to hit the jackpot. The six crews have to weigh up the consequences in these old and hazardous mines, often risking their lives in search of opal wealth, not to mention preventing opportunistic thieves from snatching their hauls.

programme.title: Survival instinct
programme.desc: Each week, a new pair of total strangers are faced with the ultimate survival challenge: survive for 21 days together with no clothes or supplies in some of the most dangerous environments in the world. They must fall back on their most primal instincts to ensure they dont become prey themselves.

programme.title: Ant Anstead: Born Mechanic
programme.desc: Ant finds a 1977 MG Midget 1500, just like the first car he restored as a teen. With tight margins and a rust issue, he pulls in his family to help.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: As the modern world becomes progressively automated and mechanised its easy to become detached from how things are made and how they work. programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: A documentary chronicling real life the adventures of one of the most deadliest professions in the world. Follow Alaskan crab fishermen as they face 40-foot waves and intense discomfort with freezing temperatures as they fish in the Bering sea. Sacrificing tooth and nail to catch the seasonal delicacies to later sell and trade on land. Witness the dangers these fisher men face as they battle against the sea, and experience how caution is a crucial part of staying alive.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: This reality TV show follows Marty Raney and his two children, Matt Raney and Misty Bilodeau, who are successful homesteaders from the state of Alaska and have the skills needed to fish, hunt, raise livestock, and otherwise survive in an untamed landscape. Struggling homesteaders across the country call these experts to help them save their homesteads and become self-sufficient while they teach them the necessary skills to survive the wilderness.

programme.title: Moonshiners: Whiskey Business
programme.desc: Whiskey production is no easy feat, as many aspiring distillers find out the hard way. Luckily for the struggling Missouri Ridge Distillery, "Moonshiners" star and experienced distiller, Tim Smith, is here to help them turn a corner and start making a profit. The business has masses of expensive equipment, forking out millions to create a distillery many moonshiners would kill for. But with pockets deeper than their knowledge of whiskey, the Missouri outfit has all the gear, but no idea. Along with fellow experts Tim Jones and Devin Mills, Tim gives the business the help it needs, sharing the knowledge and wisdom that saw him turn his illicit back-country brewing setup into a bestselling American whiskey.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. And then he and his team do the restoration turning trash to gold, so that worn objects become shining gems for which Drews customers want to pay a lot of money. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: Brake Room
programme.desc: Land speed record holder Jessi Combs and Moonshiner Josh Owens put their motor-head knowledge to the test as they compete for the mystery prize. [9-AT]

programme.title: Brake Room
programme.desc: Moonshiner Josh Owens and metal fabricator James Pumphrey face off as they aim to predict the outcome of the worlds most insane motor videos. [9-AT]

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: This reality TV show follows Marty Raney and his two children, Matt Raney and Misty Bilodeau, who are successful homesteaders from the state of Alaska and have the skills needed to fish, hunt, raise livestock, and otherwise survive in an untamed landscape. Struggling homesteaders across the country call these experts to help them save their homesteads and become self-sufficient while they teach them the necessary skills to survive the wilderness.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: In Victoria just south west of Melbourne in the You Yangs National Park Ray Mears meets up with researcher Janine Duffy in a dry eucalyptus forest. They go in search of koalas and find a young male who nervously tries to establish his own territory.Ray moves down to the open grasslands and tracks a mob of Eastern Grey kangaroos. He visits the Mount Rothwell Conservation Reserve and meets an unusual marsupial - a predator - that is almost extinct on the mainland of Australia - a Tiger Quoll - smaller relative of the Tasmanian Devil. Finally Ray journeys through a Wet Eucalyptus forest to Lake Elizabeth and canoeing across the quiet waters finds himself surrounded by rare and unique duck billed platypuses

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: In 1968, a new form of military policing was being developed in a rural area north of Los Angeles. The Los Angeles Police Department sent an observer to this unit, and he, in turn, took this knowledge back to the LAPD. This contributed to the development of the departments ﬁ rst Special Weapons and Tactics (S.W.A.T.) team. This CQB episode takes an historical journey to examine how this incident aﬀ ected and changed police tactics around the world. Using CQBs trademark "sub-second" analysis, the program also looks at how police S.W.A.T. teams train, plan and equip themselves for the challenges of urban combat. The dramatization of a 1980s S.W.A.T. siege of a gang safe-house demonstrates the complicated challenge of protecting innocent people who might be caught in the line of ﬁ re, as well as the speciﬁ cs of the squads training regimen, how they communicated, and the special equipment they used.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: The Bosnian War was an extraordinarily complex event, with many layers of military involvement including NATO forces, national militaries, irregular paramilitary forces, mujahedeen revolutionaries, private security companies, and international intelligence personnel. One tactic in particular struck fear into the hearts of the military and civilians alike: the use of snipers positioned in high buildings. This edition of CQB investigates this speciﬁ c combat technique and how it was countered by opposing forces. Taking viewers inside a "snipers den," the program explains how this tactic was so successfully used by rebel forces-and how traditional military techniques evolved to combat it.

programme.title: WWII Documentary Films
programme.desc: Award-winning documentary films produced to enlighten future generations about the personal stories of the WWII generations.

programme.title: WW1s First Frontline Cameraman
programme.desc: Geoffrey Herbert Malins is the first war kinematographer in history. The documentary he shot during the Battle of the Somme drew over 20 million British viewers in 1916. For years controversy has raged around the film due to its disconcerting violence and overt propagandist agenda,. Now, new research has proven that most of the scenes are indeed a real minute-by-minute record of the most disastrous battle in British military history. The film is a reflexion on the history of cinema and the ability to document historical events on film.

programme.title: Perception and Reality: The Magic of Science
programme.desc: Our film follows researchers who are bringing magicians tricks into the laboratory. With impossible magic, amazing facts, and opportunities for viewers to participate in the magic tricks, this extraordinary exploration peeks behind the curtain into a fascinating world where ancient magic meets modern science. Magician Julie Eng not only mystifies us with magic, she also takes us to Montreals McGill University to meet Jay Olson who is using card tricks to study consciousness. His research also includes an MRI machine that can apparently not only read minds, but also manipulate thoughts. In the US we meet with professor Anthony Barnhart. Hes a magician turned scientist who is using magic principles to investigate why we sometimes dont see whats right under our noses. We also meet Professor Amory Danek who is using the conjurors craft to study creativity and problem solving.Professor Ronald Rensink at the University of British Columbia discovered how small distractions can blind drivers to obvious dangers. These studies naturally led him to work with magicians to explore possible new experiments.In London England Gustav Kuhn conducts a study that tracks the eye movements of the magicians audience. We see tricks that fool us despite nothing actually happening, as well as demonstrations that reveal we can be blind even to our own choices. Colourful and compelling, our film takes a critical and engaging look at the fascinating facts revealed when you see the human mind through the eyes of a magician.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet.
